q: As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said," I care deeply about animals" and" am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals." He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to" propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. Dwaine Caraway said he would" welcome a clarification of the guidelines."

" When somebody gets 49 points in the first three quarters obviously its going to draw attention to the other team," said Allen Iverson , whose career high of 60 came against Orlando on Feb. 12, 2005. When somebody's got 49 points they want to make sure I get the ball out of my hands, and that's what they did. Rafer Alston responsibly is to give it up and my teammates had to make plays.
